title: Wearing New Clothes Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Wearing New Clothes Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Wearing New Clothes Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 6
items.arabic: ( اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ الْحَمْدُ أَنْتَ كَسَوْتَنِيهِ، أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ خَيْرِهِ وَخَيْرِ مَا صُنِعَ لَهُ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهِ وَشَرِّ مَا صُنِعَ لَهُ).
